subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Flyers, winners of three straight games, have been a bright spot in a city suffering through a sports hangover because of the Phillies’ elimination from the playoffs and the Eagles’ 1-4 start.
snippet: The Flyers, winners of three straight games, have been a bright spot in a city suffering through a sports hangover because of the Phillies’ elimination from the playoffs and the Eagles’ 1-4 start.
